anyone safe is in the top five of favorite places to eat .by fianc and I recently celebrated our anniversary at anyone safe .to  the chips and salsa crock my world the entree s are delicious the staff is friendly and efficient .the ambience is quiet and related .don  the carnitas taco are very greasy .anyone safe exceeds our expectations every time .you go for dinner but you stay for the chips and salsa .the chip basket includes sweet potato  blue corn  boston  and regular tortilla chips .the salsa is roasted and heavenly .recommended  the boston budget  it is juicy and flavorful .the here chicken enchiladas  love the sauce and chicken is tender .the top self margarine  suggest to share but make sure to stir or the tequila will go straight to your head .rant wait to go back .t s our little secret place that we entry because it s quiet and we usually leave dealing quite euphoric .
